title: Help! Something happened to my screen resolution with this new patch!
body: I just can't see half of minimap anymore after new patch update. No idea what happened.

replies.body: You might see this issue on 4K or resolutions higher than 1920x1080, which isn't currently supported.  You may need to reduce your resolution to fix this up, and try not to tab in+out constantly if on 4K.  Let me know if this helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8iRoUr5R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-12T17:48:54.309+0000)
>
> You might see this issue on 4K or resolutions higher than 1920x1080, which isn't currently supported.  You may need to reduce your resolution to fix this up, and try not to tab in+out constantly if on 4K.  Let me know if this helps!

1280x1024. It was ok untill last patch. Now I cant see timer, bottom lane on and other stuff on left part of the screen
